en.title: Supplement Dose Calculator
en.p: Calculate the recommended maximum daily dosage.
en.vitaminAFunctions: Vision protection, skin and mucous membrane health, cell growth, and immune function.
en.vitaminASources: Carrots, sweet potatoes, spinach, liver, egg yolks.
en.vitaminAWhoNeeds: People with poor eyesight or rough skin, growing children.
en.vitaminDFunctions: Helps absorb calcium and phosphorus to strengthen bones and teeth, regulates the immune system, and improves mood. Also known as the 'sunshine vitamin'.
en.vitaminDSources: Sunlight, fatty fish (mackerel, salmon), mushrooms, fortified dairy products.
en.vitaminDWhoNeeds: Modern people who spend a lot of time indoors, the elderly, and those concerned about bone health. Tends to be deficient in most Koreans.
en.vitaminEFunctions: Protects cell membranes from damage through powerful antioxidant action, prevents aging, improves blood circulation, and promotes skin health.
en.vitaminEWhoNeeds: People interested in anti-aging, people with poor blood circulation.
en.vitaminKFunctions: Essential role in blood clotting, contributes to bone formation and strengthening.
en.vitaminKSources: Green leafy vegetables (kale, spinach), broccoli, natto.
en.vitaminKWhoNeeds: People with low bone density, or in case of blood-related diseases (doctor consultation required).
en.vitaminBComplexWhoNeeds: People who feel chronic fatigue, office workers under a lot of stress, pregnant women (especially folic acid), vegetarians (B12).
en.vitaminCFunctions: Powerful antioxidant, strengthens the immune system, collagen synthesis (skin, gums, blood vessel health), promotes iron absorption.
en.vitaminCSources: Citrus fruits, bell peppers, broccoli, strawberries, kiwi.
en.vitaminCWhoNeeds: People who catch colds often, people interested in skin beauty, smokers (consume a lot of vitamin C).
en.calciumFunctions: Main component of bones and teeth, muscle contraction and relaxation, nerve transmission.
en.calciumWhoNeeds: Growing adolescents, postmenopausal women, the elderly. Absorption rate increases when taken with vitamin D.
en.magnesiumFunctions: Involved in more than 300 enzyme reactions, energy production, muscle relaxation (relieves eye twitching), nerve stability, blood pressure regulation.
en.magnesiumWhoNeeds: People under a lot of stress, people with frequent muscle cramps, people who want to improve the quality of their sleep.
en.ironFunctions: A component of hemoglobin, it transports oxygen in the blood.
en.ironWhoNeeds: People with anemia, women with heavy menstruation, pregnant women. Absorption rate increases when taken with vitamin C.
en.zincFunctions: Normal immune function, cell growth and division, wound healing, male hormone production.
en.zincWhoNeeds: People with weak immunity, people with slow wound healing, promoting male vitality.
en.seleniumFunctions: Powerful antioxidant action, supports thyroid function, strengthens the immune system.
en.seleniumWhoNeeds: People concerned about thyroid health, people interested in antioxidants and anti-aging.
en.iodineFunctions: A raw material for thyroid hormones, it regulates metabolism.
en.iodineWhoNeeds: People who consume little seaweed. (However, those with thyroid disease must consult a specialist)
en.omega3Functions: Improves blood circulation, reduces neutral fat levels, anti-inflammatory action, protects brain function and vision.
en.omega3WhoNeeds: Middle-aged and elderly people worried about cardiovascular health, students who need to improve their memory, people with dry eyes.
en.proteinFunctions: Forms body tissues such as muscles, skin, and hair, and produces enzymes and hormones.
en.proteinWhoNeeds: People who do strength training (whey/casein), the elderly with decreasing muscle mass, vegetarians (plant-based protein).
en.probioticsFunctions: Proliferation of beneficial bacteria in the gut, improvement of gut health, smooth bowel movements, immune regulation.
en.probioticsWhoNeeds: People with poor digestion or frequent constipation/diarrhea, people with weak immunity.
en.coq10Functions: Promotes intracellular energy production, powerful antioxidant action, blood pressure regulation, heart health.
en.coq10WhoNeeds: People who lack vitality, anti-aging, people with high blood pressure.
en.luteinFunctions: Maintains the density of macular pigment in the eye to prevent age-related vision loss and macular degeneration, and blocks blue light.
en.luteinWhoNeeds: People who use smartphones/computers for a long time, middle-aged and elderly people with blurry eyes.
en.milkThistleFunctions: Protects liver cells, improves liver function. (Silymarin component)
en.milkThistleWhoNeeds: People concerned about liver health due to frequent drinking or overwork.
en.glucosamineFunctions: As a component of cartilage, it helps with joint health and pain relief.
en.glucosamineWhoNeeds: Athletes who use their joints frequently, middle-aged and elderly people with uncomfortable joints.
en.collagenFunctions: Skin elasticity and moisturizing, joint and cartilage health.
en.collagenWhoNeeds: People with a lot of interest in skin beauty, people who want to take care of their joint health. (Low-molecular-weight fish collagen has a high absorption rate.)

ko.title: 영양제 복용량 계산기
ko.vitaminAFunctions: 시력 보호(특히 야간 시력), 피부와 점막 형성 및 기능 유지, 세포 성장 및 발달, 면역 기능 강화.
ko.vitaminASources: 당근, 고구마, 시금치, 간, 계란 노른자.
ko.vitaminAWhoNeeds: 시력이 안 좋거나 피부가 거친 사람, 성장기 어린이.
ko.vitaminDFunctions: 칼슘과 인의 흡수를 도와 뼈와 치아를 튼튼하게 함, 면역 체계 조절, 기분 전환. '햇빛 비타민'으로도 불립니다.
ko.vitaminDSources: 햇빛, 등푸른생선(고등어, 연어), 버섯, 강화 유제품.
ko.vitaminDWhoNeeds: 실내 활동이 많은 현대인, 노인, 뼈 건강이 우려되는 사람. 대부분의 한국인에게 부족한 경향이 있습니다.
ko.vitaminEFunctions: 강력한 항산화 작용으로 세포막을 손상으로부터 보호, 노화 방지, 혈액 순환 개선, 피부 건강.
ko.vitaminEWhoNeeds: 노화 방지에 관심 있는 사람, 혈액 순환이 원활하지 않은 사람.
ko.vitaminKFunctions: 혈액 응고에 필수적인 역할, 뼈 구성 및 강화에 기여.
ko.vitaminKWhoNeeds: 뼈 밀도가 낮은 사람, 혈액 관련 질환이 있는 경우(의사 상담 필수).
ko.vitaminBComplexWhoNeeds: 만성 피로를 느끼는 사람, 스트레스가 많은 직장인, 임산부(특히 엽산), 채식주의자(B12).
ko.vitaminCFunctions: 강력한 항산화제, 면역 체계 강화, 콜라겐 합성(피부, 잇몸, 혈관 건강), 철분 흡수 촉진.
ko.vitaminCWhoNeeds: 감기에 자주 걸리는 사람, 피부 미용에 관심 있는 사람, 흡연자(비타민C 소모가 많음).
ko.calciumFunctions: 뼈와 치아의 주성분, 근육 수축 및 이완, 신경 전달.
ko.calciumWhoNeeds: 성장기 청소년, 폐경 후 여성, 노인. 비타민 D와 함께 섭취 시 흡수율이 높아집니다.
ko.magnesiumFunctions: 300가지 이상 효소 반응에 관여, 에너지 생성, 근육 이완(눈 떨림 완화), 신경 안정, 혈압 조절.
ko.magnesiumWhoNeeds: 스트레스가 많은 사람, 근육 경련이 잦은 사람, 수면의 질을 높이고 싶은 사람.
ko.ironFunctions: 헤모글로빈의 구성 성분으로 혈액 내 산소 운반.
ko.ironWhoNeeds: 빈혈이 있는 사람, 월경량이 많은 여성, 임산부. 비타민 C와 함께 섭취하면 흡수율이 증가합니다.
ko.zincFunctions: 정상적인 면역 기능, 세포 성장 및 분열, 상처 회복, 남성 호르몬 생성.
ko.zincWhoNeeds: 면역력이 약한 사람, 상처 회복이 더딘 사람, 남성 활력 증진.
ko.seleniumFunctions: 강력한 항산화 작용, 갑상선 기능 지원, 면역 체계 강화.
ko.seleniumWhoNeeds: 갑상선 건강이 염려되는 사람, 항산화 및 노화 방지에 관심 있는 사람.
ko.iodineWhoNeeds: 해조류 섭취가 적은 사람. (단, 갑상선 질환자는 전문가와 상담 필수)
ko.omega3Functions: 혈행 개선, 중성지방 수치 감소, 항염증 작용, 뇌 기능 및 시력 보호.
ko.omega3WhoNeeds: 심혈관 건강이 걱정되는 중장년층, 기억력 개선이 필요한 수험생, 눈이 건조한 사람.
ko.proteinFunctions: 근육, 피부, 모발 등 신체 조직 구성, 효소 및 호르몬 생성.
ko.proteinWhoNeeds: 근력 운동을 하는 사람(유청/카제인), 근육량이 감소하는 노년층, 채식주의자(식물성 단백질).
ko.probioticsFunctions: 장내 유익균 증식, 장 건강 개선, 배변 활동 원활, 면역 조절.
ko.probioticsWhoNeeds: 소화가 잘 안 되거나 변비/설사가 잦은 사람, 면역력이 약한 사람.
ko.coq10Functions: 세포 내 에너지 생성 촉진, 강력한 항산화 작용, 혈압 조절, 심장 건강.
ko.coq10WhoNeeds: 활력이 부족한 사람, 노화 방지, 혈압이 높은 사람.
ko.luteinFunctions: 눈의 황반 색소 밀도를 유지하여 노화로 인한 시력 저하 및 황반변성 예방, 블루라이트 차단.
ko.luteinWhoNeeds: 스마트폰/컴퓨터를 오래 사용하는 사람, 눈이 침침한 중장년층.
ko.milkThistleFunctions: 간세포 보호, 간 기능 개선. (실리마린 성분)
ko.milkThistleWhoNeeds: 잦은 음주나 과로로 간 건강이 염려되는 사람.
ko.glucosamineFunctions: 연골 구성 성분으로 관절 건강 및 통증 완화에 도움.
ko.glucosamineWhoNeeds: 관절 사용이 잦은 운동선수, 관절이 불편한 중장년층.
ko.collagenFunctions: 피부 탄력 및 보습, 관절 및 연골 건강.
ko.collagenWhoNeeds: 피부 미용에 관심이 많은 사람, 관절 건강을 챙기고 싶은 사람. (저분자 피쉬콜라겐이 흡수율이 높습니다.)
